RAW.SOURCE:
` *&---------------------------------------------------------------------* *& Report ZAPLINK_EXTRACTOR *&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
REPORT zaplink_extractor MESSAGE-ID zaplink.
TABLES: tadir.
*TYPES to_synch TYPE REF TO zaplink_raw_data. " to be the first object meet in standalone generator
PARAMETERS: p_path TYPE zaplink_extractor=>td_directoryname OBLIGATORY. SELECT-OPTIONS: s_srcs FOR tadir-srcsystem DEFAULT sy-sysid, s_type FOR tadir-object, s_name FOR tadir-obj_name, s_pack FOR tadir-devclass. PARAMETERS: p_ext TYPE abap_bool AS CHECKBOX DEFAULT abap_true. SELECT-OPTIONS: s_author FOR tadir-author DEFAULT sy-uname.
SELECTION-SCREEN BEGIN OF BLOCK mode WITH FRAME TITLE text-mod. PARAMETERS em_type TYPE c RADIOBUTTON GROUP r3 DEFAULT 'X'. PARAMETERS em_pack TYPE c RADIOBUTTON GROUP r3. PARAMETERS em_cnx TYPE c RADIOBUTTON GROUP r3. SELECTION-SCREEN END OF BLOCK mode.
INITIALIZATION. DATA t_pack LIKE LINE OF s_pack.
t_pack-sign = 'I'. t_pack-option = 'EQ'. t_pack-low = 'ZAPLINK'. APPEND t_pack TO s_pack. t_pack-sign = 'E'. t_pack-option = 'EQ'. t_pack-low = 'ZAPLINK-FRAMEWORK-DEVTOOLS'. APPEND t_pack TO s_pack. t_pack-sign = 'E'. t_pack-option = 'EQ'. t_pack-low = 'ZAPLINK-TUTORIALS'. APPEND t_pack TO s_pack. t_pack-sign = 'E'. t_pack-option = 'EQ'. t_pack-low = 'ZAPLINK-INSTALLER'. APPEND t_pack TO s_pack.
AT SELECTION-SCREEN OUTPUT. DATA active TYPE i. IF em_cnx IS INITIAL. active = 1. ELSE. active = 0. ENDIF. LOOP AT SCREEN. CHECK screen-name ='S_PACK'. screen-active = active. MODIFY SCREEN. ENDLOOP.
START-OF-SELECTION. DATA o_extract TYPE REF TO zaplink_extractor. DATA d_hierarchy TYPE zaplink_extractor=>td_dirhierarchy.
* Warning : Extract might handle prog's variant and so system form are called that might afect parameters and select options values * To protect from this we have to duplicate parameters before calling methods. DATA target_dir TYPE zaplink_extractor=>td_directoryname. DATA srcsystem TYPE zaplink_extractor=>tr_srcsystem. DATA type TYPE zaplink_extractor=>tr_comptype. DATA name TYPE zaplink_extractor=>tr_compname. DATA packages TYPE zaplink_extractor=>tr_packages. DATA ext TYPE abap_bool. DATA author TYPE zaplink_extractor=>tr_author.
target_dir = p_path. srcsystem = s_srcs[]. type = s_type[]. name = s_name[]. packages = s_pack[]. ext = p_ext. author = s_author[]. CREATE OBJECT o_extract.
CASE abap_true. WHEN em_cnx. CALL METHOD o_extract->extract_connectors EXPORTING target_dir = target_dir package = packages. EXIT. WHEN em_pack. d_hierarchy = zaplink_extractor=>dirhierachies-devc. WHEN em_type. d_hierarchy = zaplink_extractor=>dirhierachies-type. ENDCASE.
o_extract->extract( target_dir = target_dir srcsystem = srcsystem type = type name = name packages = packages ext = ext hierarchy = d_hierarchy author = author ).
END-OF-SELECTION.

ITEM.LONG_TXT: U1&PURPOSE& ASThis program use ZAPLink framework to export set of ABAP component to XML files. ZAPLink default export is into a container (XML file). This tools export each ABAP component to a file. The file is overwritten if changes have been detected (using MD5 checksum). U1&INTEGRATION& AS U1&PREREQUISITES& ASRequire ZAPLink framework installed and required connectors to export each ABAP component type. U1&FEATURES& ASDetect changes. Save component in local directory. ASAllow 3 export modes : AS- "Components by type Hier." : a directory will be created for each component type using transport request convention (CLAS, PROG,...). This kind of export is used for Google Code synchronization. AS- "Components by package Hier." : a directory hierarchy will be created as an image of the package hierarchy. Each component will be stored in his package directory. Note that changing component package will move file elsewhere AS- "Components by package Hier." : a directory hierarchy will be created as an image of the package hierarchy. Each component will be stored in his package directory. Note that changing component package will move file elsewhere AS- "Connectors" this special mode is used to create a container for connector (and his dependencies) in order to publish them on the connector repository. ASThe first two modes might be useful to save your components or all components of your project. U2&SELECTION& AS"Extend to sub-packages" when selecting this option, all sub-package of a main package in your selection criteria will also be selected. Note that exclusion override sub-package extension. U2&STANDARD_VARIANTS& AS U2&OUTPUT& AS U1&ACTIVITIES& AS U1&EXAMPLE& AS

ITEM.ENTRY: ZAPLink : Extract all package to files
ZAPLink : Extraction en masse de componsants
